**Example 1: 批量申请长安链用户签名证书**



Input: 

```
tccli tbaas ApplyChainMakerBatchUserCert --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ClusterId chainmaker-itehp6pqt3 \
    --SignUserCsrList.0.CertMark user1 \
    --SignUserCsrList.0.SignCsrContent 
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "SignUserCrtList": [
            ""
        ],
        "RequestId": "4bb5dda7-3edd-4ab1-bb25-58ffdd73ead1"
    }
}
```
